full_summary:
### Intellectual Property (IP) Management Support Services
#### Solicitation Number: 01B46-2023-215
#### Release Date: 2024-01-24
#### Closing Date: 2024-02-27 at 14:00:00

[Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada](https://www.agr.gc.ca/) invites proposals from qualified firms to provide support activities for intellectual property (IP) assets management. The successful bidder will be responsible for the following services:

* Invention assessment
* Market studies
* Intellectual property brokering
* Support and advisory services

**Scope of Work**
The contract will be performed on an "as and when requested" basis using a Task Authorization. The contractor will be required to maintain a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) with Information Technology Security, issued by Public Services and Procurement Canada – Industrial Security Program.

**Eligibility Criteria**
Bidders must be capable of providing the required services and have experience in IP management.

**Evaluation Criteria**
The evaluation will be based on a combination of technical merit and price. The combined score will be used to determine the most advantageous price.

**Contract Term**
The contract is expected to commence on April 1, 2024, and end on March 31, 2025.

**Trade Agreements**
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

**Notice Posting**
A note about trade agreements is available at [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/).

**Tender Attachments**
The following documents are available for download:

* Annex B, v.2 - Basis of Payment
* RFP 01B46-2023-215
* Addendum 1 - 2023-215

### Contact Information
For further information, please contact:
Jean-François Lemay
